full_output.summary: Certified Red Hat Certified Enterprise Application Developer and Automation Anywhere Certified Advanced RPA Professional 2023. Skilled in AWS Cloud Computing, Python,and SQL. Highly motivated and academically accomplished individual with a strong interest in emerging technologies.

projects.name: Stay Ease- MERN Stack Development
projects.description: Developed an Online Hotel Booking System using MERN stack. Implemented user authentication for secure login and registration. Created a dynamic user interface with React.js for intuitive browsing and booking. Integrated third-party APIs for payment processing and hotel availability.

projects.name: Heart Disease Prediction - Using Python, Machine learning algorithm
projects.description: Developed a predictive model using Python and machine learning techniques to analyze various medical attributes and predict the likelihood of heart disease in patients. Utilized a dataset containing demographic information, medical history, and clinical parameters to train and validate the model. Implemented feature engineering, data preprocessing, and model evaluation techniques to optimize performance.

projects.name: Travel and Tourism Management System- Using Java, MYSQL, HTML, Servlets
projects.description: Developed a comprehensive web-based Travel and Tourism Management System using Java, Servlets, and HTML. The system facilitates seamless management of travel bookings, itinerary planning, and customer information. Utilized Java for backend logic and Servlets to handle HTTP requests, while HTML was employed for designing the user interface.

full_output.name: KONDURI SHIVANI
achievements_and_awards: Received the Academic Award in 2023 for achieving the highest CGPA in Btech specializing in Computer Science and Engineering (CSE) at KL UNIVERSITY.
I participated in the ImpacTech-2k23 Hackathon hosted by K L University. Recieved a certificate for active participation and contributions.
Received first position in Fastest Buzzer Quiz Coding competition. Received Appreciation Certificate. Demonstrated exceptional quick thinking and knowledge retention skills.
